assetRequirements.purpose: to capture the essence of autumn in Turkey and attract travel enthusiasts
assetRequirements.visual_style: vibrant and warm, reflecting autumn colors and Turkish landscapes
assetRequirements.content_context: showcasing the soft climate, beautiful beaches, and cultural experiences in Turkey during autumn

assetRequirements.purpose: to highlight Antalya as a key travel destination
assetRequirements.visual_style: colorful and lively, featuring markets and local cuisine
assetRequirements.content_context: depicting the vibrant markets and cultural richness of Antalya

assetRequirements.purpose: to emphasize the benefits of traveling in autumn
assetRequirements.visual_style: soft and tranquil, showcasing empty beaches and clear skies
assetRequirements.content_context: illustrating the tranquility of autumn beaches in Turkey

usageInstructions.placement: Place according to campaign layout requirements
usageInstructions.context: Use in context of: Осенняя Турция: отдых мечты по лучшей цене!. Ensure asset aligns with brand guidelines and campaign messaging.
usageInstructions.responsiveBehavior: Scale proportionally for mobile devices. Ensure minimum readable size on small screens.
emailClientNotes: Large file size may affect loading in some email clients
usageInstructions.accessibilityRequirements: Ensure alt text is provided: "AI-selected support". Alt text should be descriptive and convey the image's purpose in the email context.
usageInstructions.fallbackStrategy: If image fails to load, display alt text with appropriate background color
